Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 04 May 2019There has been speculation that recession is about the happen, for the past few years. If you had waited from then till now, you would have missed lots of opportunities.Point is, you shouldn't wait. If a recession happens after you start investing, then you average downwards, if you think the company is resilient enough to tide through the recession.0 comments1

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 04 May 2019No one has a crystal ball. Not even my mentor. For me, I'll just treat it as business as usual and chug along with my options port. Adjust along the way when necessary.If you are concerned, don't invest in lump sum quantities but dca into a strong stock counter.
